sentence.Network_en: The earth is ` frost - bound , ie frozen hard.
They are bound to take time to readjust after a holiday.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们肯定需要时间重新适应假期结束后的生活。

sentence.Network_en: There are bound to be teething problems with something so new.
sentence.Network_cn: 如此新鲜的事物刚开始必然会有些问题。

PerfectNetExp.abs: frost-bitten 冻伤的, frost-bound 连底冻, frost-bitten 受霜害的
冰霜束缚(Frost bound)：在雪崩后马上出现，唱五秒，会跑出大蓝圈，任何人不在蓝圈内的会被打8K伤害，这技能每20秒出一次

means.word_mean: 1. (of the ground) made hard by frost

auth_sentence.content: Blood was the substance that bound the kindred together.

auth_sentence.content: The first frost in fall comes later and later.

auth_sentence.content: It bound both sides to cut their nuclear arsenals.
